select sri.role_id "roleId", sri.role_name "roleName", sri.role_desc "roleDesc", sri.created_date "createdDate", sui.user_name "createdUser" from sys_role_info sri left join sys_user_info sui on sri.created_user = sui.user_id where sri.status = '10A'
and sri.role_name like concat('%', #{param.roleName}, '%')
order by sri.created_date desc
select sri.role_name from sys_role_info sri, sys_user_role_rel surr where sri.status = '10A' and sri.role_id = surr.role_id and sri.role_id in #{roleId}
select smi.menu_id "key", smi.name "title", smi.up_menu_id "upKey" from sys_menu_info smi where smi.status = '10A' order by smi.tree_leve, smi.order
select permission_id from sys_role_permission_rel where type = 'MENU' and role_id = #{roleId}
